sentence.Network_en: This exordium, and Miss Pross's two hands in quite agonised entreaty clasping his, decided Mr. Cruncher.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一番言辞, 再加上普洛丝小姐两只手攥住他的手, 表现了痛苦的请求,使克朗彻先生下定了决心.

sentence.Network_en: The body part consists of exordium, four chapters and conclusion.
sentence.Network_cn: 正文包括绪论 、 四个章节及结论三大部分.

list.abs: in his introductory exordium Obama decks by fess ing up to the embarrassment of a tyro chief executive , engaged in two wars , receiving the Nobel Peace Prize .在开场白中，奥巴马做好了铺垫，承认自己感到尴尬，他只是一位上任不久的总统，指挥着两场战争，却要接受诺贝尔和平奖。

the thesis comprises exordium straight matter and epilogue .本文共分绪论、正文与结语三部分。

chapter 1 exordium introduces the meaning of studying and applying , the actuality of studying the domestic the overseas , asas the research thinking in this article etc .第一章绪论主要介绍研究及应用意义、国内外研究现状，以及本文的研究思路等内容。
article includes eight chapters . chapter 1 is an exordium of the objective , the signification , the research actualities and methods of this research .本文内容分为八个章节，第一章绪论介绍了本研究的目的意义、研究现状和研究方法。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin, from exordiri 'begin', from ex- 'out, from' + ordiri 'begin'

means.word_mean: 1. (rhetoric) the introductory section of an oration or discourse
